description: Verify that the User Profile page loads correctly when accessing /profile with authenticated user
scenario: Logged-in user navigates to their profile page to view account information
expected_results: Display the complete user profile page with user information, status badges, and profile actions
procedure:
1. Login with valid user credentials
2. Navigate to http://localhost:5000/profile
3. Verify page loads completely
4. Check page title displays 'Profile'
5. Verify user profile information is displayed
6. Check status badges show correct account status
7. Verify profile actions section is visible

description: Verify the profile header displays correctly with user icon and status badges
scenario: User views the profile header with cybersecurity-themed design and status information
expected_results: Display 'User Profile' title with person-circle icon and animated status badges
procedure:
1. Navigate to /profile page while logged in
2. Verify profile header contains person-circle icon (bi-person-circle)
3. Check icon has blue styling and pulse animation (animate-pulse-slow)
4. Verify 'User Profile' heading is displayed prominently
5. Check header uses responsive flex layout (flex-col lg:flex-row)
6. Verify status badges are positioned correctly
7. Test header styling in dark mode

description: Verify account status badge displays correctly based on user.is_active status
scenario: User views their account status badge showing active or inactive status
expected_results: Display appropriate status badge with correct styling and icon based on account status
procedure:
1. Navigate to profile page with active user account
2. Verify 'Active Account' badge with green styling (bg-green-100 text-green-800)
3. Check badge contains check-circle icon (bi-check-circle)
4. Verify hover scale effect (hover:scale-105)
5. Test with inactive user account
6. Verify 'Inactive Account' badge with red styling (bg-red-100 text-red-800)
7. Check x-circle icon for inactive accounts
8. Test badge styling in dark mode

description: Verify member since badge displays correct registration date
scenario: User views their membership start date in a formatted badge
expected_results: Display 'Member since [Month Year]' badge with calendar icon and proper date formatting
procedure:
1. Navigate to profile page
2. Verify 'Member since' badge with blue styling (bg-blue-100 text-blue-800)
3. Check calendar-event icon (bi-calendar-event) is present
4. Verify date format shows 'Month Year' (e.g., 'January 2024')
5. Check badge uses user.created_at.strftime('%B %Y')
6. Test with various user registration dates
7. Verify hover effects and dark mode styling
8. Check badge responsiveness on mobile devices

description: Verify username is displayed correctly in styled read-only field
scenario: User views their username in a properly formatted display field
expected_results: Display username in gray read-only field with person icon and hover effects
procedure:
1. Navigate to profile page
2. Verify 'Username' label is displayed above field
3. Check username field has gray background (bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-700)
4. Verify person icon (bi-person) is displayed with username
5. Check username text is properly displayed and truncated if needed
6. Test hover effects (hover:bg-gray-100 dark:hover:bg-gray-600)
7. Verify field styling in dark mode
8. Test with various username lengths and special characters

description: Verify email address is displayed correctly in styled read-only field
scenario: User views their email address in a properly formatted display field
expected_results: Display email address in gray read-only field with envelope icon and proper formatting
procedure:
1. Navigate to profile page
2. Verify 'Email Address' label is displayed above field
3. Check email field has gray background (bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-700)
4. Verify envelope icon (bi-envelope) is displayed with email
5. Check email text is properly displayed and truncated if needed
6. Test hover effects and shadow on hover
7. Verify field styling in dark mode
8. Test with various email address lengths

description: Verify last login information displays correctly in profile actions section
scenario: User views their last login timestamp in the profile footer
expected_results: Display last login date and time in proper format, or 'First time login' for new users
procedure:
1. Navigate to profile page with user who has logged in before
2. Verify 'Last login:' text with clock icon (bi-clock)
3. Check date format 'Month DD, YYYY at HH:MM AM/PM'
4. Verify date uses user.last_login.strftime('%B %d, %Y at %I:%M %p')
5. Test with new user who has never logged in
6. Verify 'First time login' text is displayed
7. Check text truncation for long dates
8. Test styling in dark mode

description: Verify edit profile button displays correctly and navigates to edit page
scenario: User clicks edit profile button to modify their account information
expected_results: Display styled edit button that navigates to profile editing page
procedure:
1. Navigate to profile page
2. Verify 'Edit Profile' button in profile actions section
3. Check button has blue gradient styling (from-blue-600 to-indigo-600)
4. Verify pencil icon (bi-pencil) is present
5. Check hover effects (hover:from-blue-700 hover:to-indigo-700, hover:scale-105)
6. Click edit profile button
7. Verify navigation to /profile/edit page
8. Test button accessibility and keyboard navigation

description: Verify profile page requires user authentication and redirects unauthenticated users
scenario: Unauthenticated user attempts to access profile page
expected_results: Redirect unauthenticated users to login page with appropriate message
procedure:
1. Ensure user is logged out
2. Navigate directly to http://localhost:5000/profile
3. Verify redirect to login page
4. Check authentication required message or behavior
5. Login with valid credentials
6. Verify successful access to profile page
7. Test session timeout scenario
8. Check redirect preservation after login

description: Verify proper handling when database is disabled (Vercel environment)
scenario: User attempts to access profile in deployment environment with disabled database
expected_results: Display warning message about profile unavailability and redirect to home
procedure:
1. Set DISABLE_DATABASE config to True
2. Navigate to /profile page while logged in
3. Verify warning message 'User profiles are not available in this deployment environment.'
4. Check redirect to home page
5. Verify no profile information is displayed
6. Test user experience with clear messaging
7. Check no database operations are attempted
8. Verify graceful fallback behavior

description: Verify profile page elements animate correctly on page load
scenario: User observes profile page appearance animations on load
expected_results: Profile elements appear in staggered sequence with fade-in animations
procedure:
1. Navigate to profile page (clear cache first)
2. Observe animation sequence on page load
3. Verify header animates first (animate-fade-in-up)
4. Check status badges animate with 0.1s and 0.2s delays
5. Verify profile information animates with 0.1s delay (animate-fade-in-left)
6. Check profile fields animate with 0.2s delay
7. Verify profile actions animate with 0.6s delay
8. Test animation performance and smoothness

description: Verify profile page displays correctly in dark mode
scenario: User toggles dark mode and uses profile page
expected_results: All elements display properly with dark theme colors and proper contrast
procedure:
1. Navigate to profile page
2. Toggle dark mode using theme switcher
3. Verify background changes to dark theme (dark:bg-gray-800)
4. Check status badges use dark theme colors
5. Verify text colors invert properly (dark:text-white)
6. Test profile fields styling in dark mode
7. Check button gradients work in dark theme
8. Verify icon colors adapt to dark mode
9. Test accessibility and contrast ratios

description: Verify profile page is responsive across different screen sizes
scenario: User accesses profile page on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices
expected_results: Page adapts properly to different screen sizes while maintaining functionality
procedure:
1. Navigate to profile page on desktop (1920x1080)
2. Verify layout uses max-width constraint (max-w-4xl)
3. Resize browser to tablet size (768px width)
4. Check grid layout changes (grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2)
5. Resize to mobile size (375px width)
6. Verify header layout adapts (flex-col lg:flex-row)
7. Test status badges stacking (flex-col md:flex-row)
8. Check profile actions section responsiveness (flex-col sm:flex-row)
9. Verify text truncation works on small screens
10. Test landscape and portrait orientations

description: Verify profile page only displays data for the authenticated user
scenario: User can only view their own profile information, not other users' data
expected_results: Profile page displays only current user's information with proper security
procedure:
1. Login with User A credentials
2. Navigate to profile page
3. Verify only User A's information is displayed
4. Note User A's username and email
5. Logout and login with User B credentials
6. Navigate to profile page
7. Verify only User B's information is displayed
8. Check no data leakage between users
9. Test direct URL manipulation attempts
10. Verify session security prevents unauthorized access

description: Verify edit profile functionality and navigation flow
scenario: User navigates from profile view to profile editing page
expected_results: Seamless navigation to edit profile page with proper context preservation
procedure:
1. Navigate to profile page
2. Click 'Edit Profile' button
3. Verify navigation to /profile/edit URL
4. Check edit profile page loads correctly
5. Verify user context is preserved
6. Test back navigation to profile page
7. Check breadcrumb or navigation consistency
8. Verify edit profile page security (authentication required)

description: Verify profile displays accurate and up-to-date user information
scenario: User views profile and sees current, accurate account information
expected_results: All displayed information matches current user data in database
procedure:
1. Login with known user account
2. Navigate to profile page
3. Verify username matches user.username value
4. Check email matches user.email value
5. Verify account status reflects user.is_active
6. Check created date matches user.created_at
7. Verify last login matches user.last_login
8. Update user information via admin or database
9. Refresh profile page
10. Verify changes are reflected immediately

description: Verify long usernames and emails are properly truncated and displayed
scenario: User with long username or email views profile page
expected_results: Long text is truncated with ellipsis while maintaining layout integrity
procedure:
1. Create user with very long username (25+ characters)
2. Navigate to profile page
3. Verify username field uses truncate class
4. Check text is cut off with ellipsis (...)
5. Test with long email address
6. Verify email field truncation works properly
7. Check layout doesn't break with long text
8. Test on mobile devices with limited space
9. Verify hover or tooltip shows full text if implemented

description: Verify profile page loads efficiently with optimal performance
scenario: User accesses profile page and expects fast loading times
expected_results: Page loads within acceptable time limits with all styling and functionality
procedure:
1. Clear browser cache
2. Open browser developer tools Performance tab
3. Navigate to profile page
4. Record page load time and performance metrics
5. Verify total load time is under 2 seconds
6. Check First Contentful Paint (FCP) is under 1 second
7. Verify Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) is acceptable
8. Test page load on slower network connections
9. Check for render-blocking resources
10. Verify animations don't impact performance significantly

description: Verify date and time information is properly formatted and localized
scenario: User views creation date and last login with proper formatting
expected_results: Dates display in readable format with proper timezone handling
procedure:
1. Navigate to profile page
2. Check member since date format (Month Year)
3. Verify last login format (Month DD, YYYY at HH:MM AM/PM)
4. Test with various timezone settings
5. Check date formatting handles different locales
6. Verify edge cases (midnight, noon, different months)
7. Test with users created at different times
8. Check date formatting consistency across browsers

description: Verify proper error handling when profile data cannot be loaded
scenario: System encounters errors when loading user profile information
expected_results: Graceful error handling with appropriate user feedback
procedure:
1. Simulate database connection issues
2. Navigate to profile page
3. Verify appropriate error handling
4. Check user receives meaningful error message
5. Test with missing user data scenarios
6. Verify fallback behavior for incomplete profiles
7. Check error logging for debugging
8. Test recovery when database connection is restored

description: Verify profile page meets accessibility standards (WCAG)
scenario: User with disabilities accesses profile page using assistive technologies
expected_results: Page is fully accessible with proper labels, ARIA attributes, and keyboard navigation
procedure:
1. Navigate to profile page
2. Test keyboard navigation through all interactive elements
3. Verify tab order is logical (edit profile button)
4. Check all labels are properly associated with content
5. Test page with screen reader software
6. Verify focus indicators are visible and clear
7. Check color contrast ratios meet WCAG AA standards
8. Test status badges are announced by screen readers
9. Verify icons have appropriate alt text or ARIA labels
10. Check semantic HTML structure (headings, sections)

description: Verify profile page works correctly across different browsers
scenario: User accesses profile page using different web browsers
expected_results: Consistent functionality and appearance across major browsers
procedure:
1. Test profile page in Chrome (latest version)
2. Verify all functionality and styling works correctly
3. Test in Firefox (latest version)
4. Check animations and CSS effects
5. Test in Safari (if available)
6. Verify gradients and modern CSS features work
7. Test in Edge browser
8. Check responsive design across browsers
9. Verify JavaScript functionality works consistently
10. Test mobile browsers (Chrome mobile, Safari mobile)

description: Verify CSS grid layout works correctly for profile information
scenario: Profile information fields are displayed in proper grid layout
expected_results: Username and email fields display in responsive grid layout
procedure:
1. Navigate to profile page on desktop
2. Verify grid layout uses 2 columns (grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2)
3. Check equal spacing between grid items (gap-6)
4. Resize to mobile view
5. Verify grid collapses to single column
6. Test grid layout with different content lengths
7. Check grid item alignment and spacing
8. Verify grid adapts to various screen sizes
9. Test grid browser compatibility

description: Verify profile actions footer displays and functions correctly
scenario: User views and interacts with profile actions section at bottom of page
expected_results: Profile actions section displays with proper styling and functionality
procedure:
1. Navigate to profile page
2. Scroll to bottom and verify profile actions section
3. Check gray background styling (bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-900/50)
4. Verify border top separation (border-t border-gray-200)
5. Check responsive layout (flex-col sm:flex-row)
6. Verify last login information on left
7. Check edit profile button on right
8. Test section spacing and alignment
9. Verify section styling in dark mode

description: Verify user context is properly maintained throughout profile viewing session
scenario: User's session and context remain consistent while viewing profile
expected_results: Current user context is maintained and secure throughout profile session
procedure:
1. Login with specific user account
2. Navigate to profile page
3. Verify current_user context is correct
4. Open new tab and perform other actions
5. Return to profile tab
6. Verify user context is preserved
7. Test session timeout handling
8. Check user context after profile updates
9. Verify no context leakage between users

screen_design_ref: Figure 12.26: Profile Card Shadow and Styling
description: Verify profile card has proper shadow effects and styling
scenario: User views profile page with enhanced visual styling
expected_results: Profile card displays with shadow effects and proper visual hierarchy
procedure:
1. Navigate to profile page
2. Verify main card has shadow-xl effect
3. Check rounded corners (rounded-lg)
4. Verify background colors (bg-white dark:bg-gray-800)
5. Check card overflow handling
6. Test shadow effects in different lighting conditions
7. Verify card styling in dark mode
8. Check visual hierarchy and contrast

description: Verify all icons display correctly with proper styling and alignment
scenario: User views profile page with all icons properly rendered
expected_results: All Bootstrap icons display correctly with proper colors and alignment
procedure:
1. Navigate to profile page
2. Verify person-circle icon in header (bi-person-circle)
3. Check status badge icons (bi-check-circle, bi-x-circle, bi-calendar-event)
4. Verify profile field icons (bi-person, bi-envelope)
5. Check action icons (bi-clock, bi-pencil)
6. Test icon colors and sizing
7. Verify icon alignment with text
8. Check icon rendering in dark mode
9. Test icon accessibility

description: Verify hover effects and transitions work correctly throughout profile page
scenario: User hovers over interactive elements and observes smooth transitions
expected_results: All hover effects and transitions work smoothly without glitches
procedure:
1. Navigate to profile page
2. Hover over status badges and verify scale effect (hover:scale-105)
3. Check profile field hover effects (hover:bg-gray-100)
4. Hover over edit profile button and verify gradient transition
5. Test transition durations (duration-300, duration-200)
6. Check shadow transitions (hover:shadow-lg)
7. Verify all transitions are smooth
8. Test hover effects on touch devices

description: Verify profile page has proper SEO elements and security headers
scenario: Search engines and security scanners analyze profile page
expected_results: Page has proper title, security headers, and prevents indexing of user data
procedure:
1. Navigate to profile page
2. View page source and check title tag shows 'Profile'
3. Verify noindex meta tag (user pages should not be indexed)
4. Check for proper heading hierarchy
5. Verify security headers prevent framing/embedding
6. Test robots.txt handling for user pages
7. Check canonical URL if applicable
8. Verify no sensitive information in meta tags

description: Verify user profile system meets security best practices and compliance requirements
scenario: Security audit of user profile functionality and implementation
expected_results: System follows security best practices and prevents common vulnerabilities
procedure:
1. Audit authentication requirements for profile access
2. Verify user data isolation and privacy
3. Check protection against profile enumeration
4. Test for injection vulnerabilities in profile display
5. Verify proper session management
6. Check CSRF protection if applicable
7. Test for information disclosure vulnerabilities
8. Verify proper error handling doesn't leak information
9. Check logging for security events
10. Verify compliance with security frameworks (OWASP)
11. Test profile access against common attack vectors
12. Verify secure communication (HTTPS enforcement)
13. Check data encryption and storage security
